Title: Hongzhen Chronicle Volume XIX: Major Events I
Text:
...
March. Various lands were ravaged by TD Outbreaks, and 31 victims climbed the mountain.
April 9. A TD Outbreak approached Mt. Firmament. On the night of the same day, a stream of fire fell on Empyrean Cliff. (Note: Empyrean Cliff was later renamed as Loong's Crest)
April 21. Two townspeople lured an outsider to the place where the stream of fire fell on Empyrean Cliff.
April 22. A TD Outbreak invaded Hongzhen. The Sentinel called Jué emerged from Empyrean Cliff, slowing the flow of time with its Temporal Mandate to repel the TD Outbreak and forming Mt. Firmament.
April 23. An outsider visited Hongzhen with the Sentinel Jué and left the mountain with 17 other townspeople later.
...
July 3. The outsider returned to Mt. Firmament, seemingly unaffected by the Temporal Disruptions. The locals have been referring to them as "that peculiar visitor" ever since."
